member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Google.GoogleAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelCertificateValidator
member.summary: Gets or sets the a pinned certificate validator to use to validate the endpoints used in back channel communications belong to Google.
member.remarks: If this property is null then the default certificate checks are performed, validating the subject name and if the signing chain is a trusted party.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Google.GoogleAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets timeout value in milliseconds for back channel communications with Google.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Google.GoogleAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelHttpHandler
member.summary: The HttpMessageHandler used to communicate with Google. This cannot be set at the same time as BackchannelCertificateValidator unless the value can be downcast to a WebRequestHandler.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Google.GoogleAuthenticationOptions.Caption
member.summary: Get or sets the text that the user can display on a sign in user interface.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Google.GoogleAuthenticationOptions.CallbackPath
member.summary: The request path within the application's base path where the user-agent will be returned. The middleware will process this request when it arrives. Default value is "/signin-google".

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Google.GoogleAuthenticationOptions.SignInAsAuthenticationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of another authentication middleware which will be responsible for actually issuing a user .

member.summary: Gets or sets the used to handle authentication events.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type used to secure data handled by the middleware.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Google.Infrastructure.Message.Add(Microsoft.Owin.IReadableStringCollection,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds the openid parameters from querystring or form body into Namespaces and Properties collections. This normalizes the parameter name, by replacing the variable namespace alias with the actual namespace in the collection's key, and will optionally skip any parameters that are not signed if the strict argument is true.
member.param: The keys and values of the incoming querystring or form body
True if keys that are not signed should be ignored
